string-array.name: Q32
string-array.item: Which describes a moving average the best?
an indicator that shows the average price of an asset over a period of time.
an indicator that measures the strength of an assets price movement.
an indicator that shows the volatility of an assets price.

string-array.name: Q33
string-array.item: Which describes an RSI the best?
an indicator that measures the strength of an assets price movement.
an indicator that shows the average price of an asset over a period of time.
an indicator that shows the volatility of an assets price.

string-array.name: Q34
string-array.item: Which describes an OBV the best?
an indicator that shows the relationship between an assets price and its volume.
an indicator that shows the average price of an asset over a period of time.
an indicator that shows the volatility of an assets price.
